website_summaries.verdict: TCL's C-series with Roku TV should be on your short list if you're looking for a big-screen smart television with a small price tag.
pros: Roku TV platform with enhanced remote
cons: Shadow details are detailed, but not quite as dark as they could be
Soundbar-like bottom bezel doesn't actually provide improved sound

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great quality. Legend.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. TCL is killing it. It’s like Vizio in 2005. Great quality for bottom prices. What’s really awesome about this 65” is it include Dolby, a sound system superior to most sound bars at the $200 price point, and uses Roku’s OS. Samsung and a bunch of companies decided to write their own OS. Unfortunately their Linux ports all didn’t work out. Every Samsung I owned died early and had horrible “smart” features. TCL took a good functioning OS and installed it on a sick piece of hardware. You need this TV
customer_reviews.author: Meech

customer_reviews.title: So far it has been fantastic. I have tested the HDR with with actual ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had mine for a day so take this with a grain of salt. So far it has been fantastic. I have tested the HDR with with actual 4k blurays and a uhd bluray player. The interface is easy to use. I have never used roku before but it was extremely easy to get a handle on. The picture quality is great. It honestly is a great deal. I have also watched 1080p content from sources like Crunchyroll and Funimation on it and the up-scaling looks fantastic as well. So far it has been a great experience. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: cwhazzoo

customer_reviews.title: Great features, very modern.
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome features, unbelievable for the price. Your phone fully controls the TV (as well as the remote obviously). It integrates great with your PC and it is very fast. The whole TV operates like an IPad with the menus/etc. feels like a fast computer that can also play your cable :). It also looks very sleek with the almost non existent bezel and the modern stand. Can turn the brightness up/down very easily with a couple buttons from the remote too (great for kids that stand too close) (press *).
customer_reviews.author: John Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: but not as good as this one)
customer_reviews.text: TCL has put out different models in 2017 (a friend bought a different model, which is OK, but not as good as this one), and I recommend this model -- GORGEOUS color and sound -- I can't say enough good about it. I had to call customer service once about something minor (easily addressed), and they were terrific. The quality is amazing -- I would never believe it cost as little as it does.........this won't last. You won't regret purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Prefect TV for cord cutters.
customer_reviews.text: Prefect TV for cord cutters, gamers and movie buffs. Picture quality = great, sound quality = great, design = great, ease of use = outstanding. With any TV these days I still recommend using a sound bar or surround sound speakers. For the audio I recommend using a receiver that has an ARC HDMI connection. Therefore when you turn the TV on/off your receiver turns on/off as well. Then the volume and mute buttons on the remote control the volume on the receiver. And don’t forget your UHD blue ray player.
customer_reviews.author: REIGN iN SLAYER

customer_reviews.title: The tv is brighter at the edges of the screen than in the middle
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 months of owning the TV, I started noticing that the edges of the screen were significantly brighter than what they should be. Appears to be some sort of light bleeding that is pretty noticable and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Cao

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice tv but I'd have choose TCL P model, Samsung or Sony instead
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tv for one year. I got it at $700, now is at $500. Maybe for $500 is a better deal, but for the price I paid, I'd have preferred to get a similar range price Samsung or Sony tv. Black levels are bad, you can actually see some light patterns in the tv during dark scenes. I changed 3 times the tv until the tv was acceptable. If you receive it and see problems with it, return it immediately instead of using TCL warranty (slow, takes time and not worthy). Positive side: decent audio, Dolby Vision (looks great on a dark room) and Roku tv, is the best part of the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 75 inch TV- My contractor signed for the TV - and I let him know that the delivery company was supposed to deliver the TV but unbox and set it up and test it - they did none of the above. Took me forever to remove the TV from the well packed cartons and then remove the debris from my living roon (delivery company was supposed to do ALL that mind you. Picture quality is decent - Roku UI works well - preliminary reaction; is good buy for the money. Will review more later as I get more time in front of the TV
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Once you go 4K... you can never go back
customer_reviews.text: This TV is amazing! It looks spectacular. I watched the NASCAR races with the TV and the 4k looks incredible. It is also good for gaming. There isn't any noticeable input lag and playing games on my Xbox One X in 4k is stunning. Halo 5 and Halo 2 Anniversary were already good looking but look even better on a 4k TV. The remote even came with earbuds which are also great quality.
customer_reviews.author: William E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching things
customer_reviews.text: Great everything. Good price. Makes all of the mindless garbage on TV very realistic and at times beautiful to look at. Easy to setup. Roku works seamlessly with the TV. Remote is simle and effective. Our second TCL 4K set for a reason... a lot of reasons, actually.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 55" C807 from Amazon. The TV arrived one day late, but otherwise all was well. The TV was well packed, and without damage. It was easy to install, and setup was a breeze. I must say, I've owned Philips, LG, Sharp and Vizio TV's, but none compared to the picture quality, and smart features this TV has. I am not a professional, but the 4KHD picture quality was unbelievable. It was so lifelike, as though you can reach out and touch it. This photo was taken from a wireless 4KHD feed from YouTube. Can you imagine what a hard-line CAT5 cable would look like.
customer_reviews.author: TonyII

customer_reviews.title: So far I’m in love. For the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the TV a couple of weeks, but just wow!! So far I’m in love. For the price, the pic is amazing, apps are easy to use, & the delivery & set up were a breeze. One of the things I saw other reviewers posting was the sound system. I got a sound bar with this TV, & honestly, I’ve barely used it. The speakers are good quality, & I’m loving this TV right now.
customer_reviews.author: Anissa Cox

customer_reviews.title: Just an incredible TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV a few months back and have been 1,000% satisfied since. Beautiful TV, great design and even better picture. For the price, the best TV your money can buy. Beautiful colors. I mainly use it for gaming and watching movies, and each time I use it I’m in awe at how outstanding the picture looks. It literally makes me feel like I’m right there in the movie I’m watching or game I’m playing. But what are you still reading this review for? Go buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tv with an awesome picture!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is everything I wanted from a 65" tv and the Roku very convenient setup for all my devices and access point to my subscriptions. The picture is great and cannot find any dead pixels. Never heard of TCL so this is my first experience using their product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great TV. ROKU TV is simple to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great TV. ROKU TV is simple to use and intuitive. USB port is even powerful enough to drive an external USB hard drive that previous TV would not do. So far very pleased with purchase. TCL may be a relatively new/unknown brand but IMHO is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Engineering

customer_reviews.title: Greta deal in big screen
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound at great value. My delivery included unpacking, testing and removal of all the packing materials, making it an even better deal. This size TV is too heavy for one person to mount. I got two friends to help and it took all three of us, so consider the installation at extra charge option. As far as the TV itself, great, bright picture. amazing clarity and definition, theatre quality sound. This 75" size seems to be a great value too as the next larger is at least twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Sprit

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I received this TV yesterday. Maybe it is the fact that I have not bought a new TV in almost 10 years but I am amazed at the picture of this TV. The picture is crisp and very bright. You can adjust the brightness level if you think it is too bright but for me the brightness is perfect. This TV also has Roku built in. There are many movies and TV shows you get for free. They are not new movies but good classics that I really enjoy watching. I would highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a new TV
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture in a sleek design!
customer_reviews.text: While admittedly I'm not a tech person, in my view this picture is stunning. I also love the sleek look of the TV. Currently I have it on a TV stand and the feet are minimal but support the TV well. I am looking forward to wall mounting it though for an even sleeker look. Also love the built in Roku feature, which makes using various steaming websites a breeze. For the price this TV picture can't be beat! I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this tv overall. Slick design, vibrant picture and a user friendly interface are just some of the features that make it great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruin13

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TV, WATCH FOR SCAMMERS ON ROKU ACTIVATE SEARCH.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, What a deal. Love it. HOWEVER, WHEN YOU SET UP AND GO ONLINE TO "ACTIVATE" WATCH OUT FOR SCAMMERS ON THE FIRST SEVERAL SITES ARE SCAMMERS AND WANT $$$$ TO ACTIVATE. THEY ARE SCAMMERS NOT FROM ROKU. CALL THE TELE IN THE DIRECTIONS (CUS SERVICE) AND THEY WILL DIRECT YOU TO THE PROPER SIT TO ACTIVATE FOR FREE.... NO MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff789

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value. Every bit as good as Visio and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Every bit as good as Visio and Samsung units we could have paid more for. Built in Roku is great and it allows you to switch to other devices or antenna from the main screen. For cord cutters this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: SW Florida

customer_reviews.title: Punching above it's weight!
customer_reviews.text: This TV was an amazing pickup for me. While compared to other 4K peers the picture quality isn't great, the price and the Roku functionality certainly makes up for things. It's really easy to use and jump between apps and the additional Roku network that streams free content is a plus. Only issue is that the TV isn't that LOUD per se, but I think that's more of a factor of me not having a sound bar than anything else. I would definitely recommend a purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when unboxing
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when removing the outer packaging, the bottom end of the original box might give way and the TV will literally slide out of the box..
customer_reviews.author: Shane D.

customer_reviews.title: From 55" to 75" WOW!
customer_reviews.text: We went from a 55" to a 75", and what a difference! It's gorgeous! The quality and sharpness (picture) are awesome! We love having Roku with the tv as well. It was a great price too! We've only had it for less than a week, and I hope it doesn't disappoint, because we are loving this tv!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: My TV screen suffers from 5% color uniformity issues , mainly on the black screen slightly on the gray screen color Pallet , however the rest of the screen is brilliant and incredible. The value in the craftsmanship that was put into this particular set I’m blown away by it
customer_reviews.author: Tovarizer

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level 4K
customer_reviews.text: Has minor issues when changing inputs or apps that have Dolby Vision support. This affects HDR/D.V. content and makes the screen very dark. Had to reboot/reset/power cycle TV to recover. Picture is great but will show some LED bleed in very dark rooms. Limited picture and audio adjustments but that could be a good thing for most. TCL support was quick to reply. 3rd TCL product purchased and happy with all of them. The HDR support is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound. wish it had 4 hdmi's only 3. RoKu is not my favorite feature, but it's ok. Got the 55" for $599. Hurry up and get one before the tariffs kick in and it will cost more...
customer_reviews.author: Angelo S.

customer_reviews.title: Backlight issue
customer_reviews.text: Just got my TV today and was thrilled to be experiencing all these movies in 4k high-definition. When I had a long day at work and finally decided to sit down and watch some Supernatural I noticed this glare on my TV screen. I looked up all the reviews and other customers say they had this issue as well. Apparently, is known as backlight which I believe there is no fix for this is just the TV. So now I have to return this TV, contact the company complain to them then think about ordering another TV from the same company or buying a new TV. I am very unsatisfied with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a good TV for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the smart TV functions being done by Roku. I haven't had any of the interface issues or app buffering problems I've had with other "smart" TVs/DVD players. I particularly like that the inputs are part of the home Roku menu. The TV itself it bright in full light and I haven't had any response frequency issues. In the dark on a black screen, I do notice the issues with an edge lit TV though. Overall it's a good TV for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Pete V

customer_reviews.title: Price for value proposition is tops.
customer_reviews.text: Got for oversized den. Color and quality outstanding. Second Roku TV, super easy to set up, love Roku. General complaint with Roku TVs in that no Bluetooth so need adapter for sound system. Other general complaint in that can’t scroll left or right with Dishnetwork remote, so need to buy good universal remote or have multiple remotes. Sound from TV is OK, not great. With all that said, the price for this quality is nothing short of amazing.
customer_reviews.author: f keith handley

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Big TV, good for the price. Honestly a little disappointed in price between this and the 65". I don't think it's worth it to pay double for just 10 more inches (heyo!) The 75” was supposed to have superior sound, but I did not notice any significant difference. I'd just buy two 65" and put them side by side for the same price as a single 75”.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L.

customer_reviews.title: Premium Gaming Friendly 4K TV at the Best Price
customer_reviews.text: This television is amazing! I just set mine up and will come back and add more to this review. If you are reading this, make sure the seller is not BidTrade LLC. They ship through CEVA Logistics and it is a nightmare. The television is fabulous, but I highly recommend you buy from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great great tv ! We already were fans of using a Roku . We did a lot of research before we bought the Tlc tv ! Picture is amazing and the speakers in front are great . We have the 65 inch one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV till the OLEDS come down in price
customer_reviews.text: I like this TV very much, for the price it is perfect till the OLEDS come down, way down. Very good picture, sound is ok but will be adding speakers of some sort shortly. Wish the remote was better or would work with my Dish remote, will be looking into a solution for that. Overall I am happy with the device.
customer_reviews.author: FairweatherNine

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me and every dollar you spend is an investment, then this is the TV for you!
customer_reviews.text: Don't fall into the trap of looking at reviews for hours, only to up-sale yourself on features you didn't know you "wanted" in the first place. A week in, this TV has been fantastic for the price! The Roku interface is extremely user friendly and fast. Streaming Netflix, Amazon Video, and HBO GO has been a breeze. I highly recommend buying this TV if you're like me, and couldn't justify spending $1000 more for features I may not have really noticed. Plus, it's made in the USA! Save some money and spend it on your family, vacation, or something more important.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and best price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and finish. Picture is perfect and the review on CNET was very helpful. Rated one of the best UHD TV in 2017. At more than half the price of comparable product from Samsung. Love the easy to use and very practical remote.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Adam

customer_reviews.title: Pops, static, green screen unresolved
customer_reviews.text: The TV would be satisfactory if it weren't for the fact that it sometimes pops, runs static, shows a green screen, then goes black. This problem was very pronounced when we bought it, so we reached out to the TCL customer service department, who advised us to buy a different HDMI cable. The problem has since become less frequent, and the TV is mostly useable, but repeated attempts to contact TCL have been met with silence, although we are still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: David Vermette

customer_reviews.title: Great Roku based TV.
customer_reviews.text: Not OLED, but wow is it good. Note: they aren’t kidding when they tell you handle it only from the bottom (grab the speaker), and not the thin upper screen section. Grabbing it there leaves permanent “light spots”. Permanent.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a 55” TV!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 55” TV. Picture is great, menus are obvious. Only complaint might be the sound quality, it’s a pretty tinny. Audio out to a sub and a few satellites and now it’s perfect. (Used 2.5mm jack)
customer_reviews.author: Yo Jay

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this tv. The color could maybe be a tad better but for the money I'm not complaining. The sound with the front firing speakers is better than most tv's now days but would still like to have a bit more watts in each speaker. The size is great and the built in Roku is the absolute best part are this tv since I no longer have cable!!
customer_reviews.author: Blkgb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy-I have no electronic skills and it took me less than 5 minutes to set up-not heavy but due to size need 2 people to put on its included stand-It also connects up w my cable subscription-but it doesn’t work as smoothly as tv w connected cable box-that’s Spectrums fault tho
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. McCollough

customer_reviews.title: Inspect your tv....
customer_reviews.text: Tv has a large "stain" whenever it displays a dark screen. Apparently theres no option to replace with this company which left me either paying to return it or living with it. The image quality is great but the stain is so hard to look at...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great television for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great television for the price. The main issues coming from a 2010 Samsung 1080 LED TV is the colors aren't as vivid and there are crushed blacks and whites. For most television content the crush isn't present or noticeable. The HDR coming from an Xbox One X isn't that impressive on this TV. The 4K is really really good!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one compared to a 2018 model since it had more features and a better picture for less money. It was easy to set up, it has as good a picture as the $1500 tv I bought 6 years ago. The Roku remote took a few minutes to get used to, but the ability to listen with headphones/earbuds is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: MPMeterman

customer_reviews.title: TCL C-series is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a Samsung TV owner. Always very critical of other TVs but after doing research on the TCL C series TV I decided to go for it and get it. I am very surprised at how good the TCL C Series picture is. Also the sound on it is very good. The sound strip on the bottom of the TV sounds like a high quality sound bar! I am now a believer in the TCL TVs. Oh and did I say that the price for these TVs are pretty awesome! Definitely the way to go for a bargain 4K TV that is really good with the picture and sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Adam D

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a wonderful TV. This model has the speakers in the front bottom and the sound comes toward you. It is last year's model and we specifically ordered it as the newer ones have speakers on the bottom that produce sound downward to the tabletop or cabinet top you have the TV sitting on. Great picture. Mine was one year old and was broken in a move to a new house. Amazon got this one to me safely in 2 days. We were happy
customer_reviews.author: "rcb9900"

customer_reviews.title: amazing picture and color for the price
customer_reviews.text: amazing picture and color for the price. i dont use the built in apps but it has been a great addition to my man cave.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: The perfect solution for a mancave. With good speakers and Roku built in it only takes one plug from tv and you have instant entertainment. Picture is incredible and value is fantastic. I don’t understand what you would pay 2-4x more for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I find the tv to be a great tv. It's a great idea of the speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoye this tv, after finding the correct screen setting, color, brightness, contrast ect. I find the tv to be a great tv. It's a great idea of the speakers facing forward toward the viewer but it would be excellent if it had a little more bass
customer_reviews.author: Q 45 Reyes

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with the performance of this TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking set with a great natural looking picture quality. I love that the screen isn't too reflective. The Roku interface is perfection. Much nicer then my Apple or Amazon stick. I love that I am able to plug my fancy headphone into the remote control and enjoy great sound while not disturbing anyone and no long cable to trip over. The setup was very easy too. The only small gripe is that I would have liked more then 3 HDMI outputs. Also the power cord is too short. The box came very beat up and I was concerned, but the unit had no scratches and works flawlessly. Overall I highly recommend this TV!
customer_reviews.author: amaleshk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: the color and depth of the picture on this thing is amazing. i'm so glad i bought it. even my son, who paid about 1/3 more for his tv said that this tv is way better than his. now i just have to get used to using the "smart" features and the roku part of it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Burrey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with multiple bright spots, had to return
customer_reviews.text: Picture looked great until the sun went down, then started to notice the glaring bright spots throughout the screen. Return process was very smooth/easy but can't recommend based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: jarebear44

customer_reviews.title: Giant TV for a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Based on so many positive reviews on here, I decided to purchase this giant screen. I just mounted it and I can't wait to see what all the fuss is about. The delivery was super fast and on time. I'll be updating my review once I get the chance to see this beast up close.
customer_reviews.author: Arjy Duah

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. Not too bright tho
customer_reviews.text: Great set wish it was a bit brighter especially for her content but still a great screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: ... clear and most important to operation the remote is easy. Love the free ROKU movies
customer_reviews.text: The picture screen os clear and most important to operation the remote is easy. Love the free ROKU movies.
customer_reviews.author: heather Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Good features at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but it has all the features I wanted at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MyReviews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the TV. Grea image and sound. My first Roku experience has been great.
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat the quality for the price of this TV. Great picture and lots of options to connect different accessories like game systems, etc... I would definitely buy another TCL TV.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Goody

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and I love the Roku function
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. Great picture and I love the Roku function. Easy set up. Two months later still going strong. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This Tv Dims randomly on its own making it impossible to see anything. It's like it goes into power save mode every time a dark seen comes on. Tried to have resolved through TCL with no luck (awful tech support). Spent countless hours messing with setting still no luck. Pretty expensive mistake But one i will never make again!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This TV is great, very good Apps
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great, very good Apps, had everything we wanted to be able to access right from the start. Remote took a little getting used to, but now I cant imagine going back to a big bulky remote. Great Picture
customer_reviews.author: BMAD

customer_reviews.title: Color and clarity are awesome. The thing that I really like is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Color and clarity are awesome. The thing that I really like is that I can use ear buds through the remote. The only thing that I do not like about it is that there is no Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Love the TV, hate the remote
customer_reviews.text: The TV picture is great. The remote uses batteries faster than anything, not just any remote, but anything I've ever had that uses batteries. Manufacturer should fix that problem and recall all remotes and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: J. McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Sound is pretty good out-of-the-box
customer_reviews.text: Almost zero latency from the controller. Incredibly responsive. Do think that it will look more aesthetically pleasing mounted than it currently does on its legs. The darks are definitely not as dark as those on the P series, but the C series is a significantly more aesthetically pleasing television. Seemingly a tradeoff between elegance and contrast (though the C series is no slouch overall when it comes to picture). Sound is pretty good out-of-the-box. Just listing my thoughts - overall a fantastic television so far.
customer_reviews.author: Will Barry

customer_reviews.title: Best picture, best value.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture and easy to use. I would stack this picture against TVs that cost 3 times as much and challenge you to find a difference. Only complaint was that the box was falling apart when the tv came but there was no damage to the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth  Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV and quick delivery. If I could go back in time I would have bought the 65 inch. I wasnt sure about it but once I set it up and turn it on..wow! Clear, sharp and nice design. The roku features ? top notch and super easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Abel B

customer_reviews.title: So far, no problems! For the price, ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, no problems! For the price, you simply cannot beat it. Would I buy one again? Yep, you could bet on it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but get an Extended Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Repair sucks. My main TV died and i'm stuck with "pending parts" no ETR. Woke up one day after less than a year and it won't power on.
customer_reviews.author: Fredo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: Only been a couple of months on 2 TCL roku TVs. Love them so far. They are a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: otherwise this was good, still needs a sound bar
customer_reviews.text: really wanted the P607 but was out of stock at the time. otherwise this was good, still needs a sound bar, the front audio is better than most but still sounds tinny.
customer_reviews.author: Official iGamer

customer_reviews.title: Best TV I have ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is beautiful in design and it's picture is amazing. Integrating ROKU into a TV of this quality is genius! I recommend this TV to anyone reading this review.
customer_reviews.author: Char. B

customer_reviews.title: great price for this very good TV
customer_reviews.text: very nice product, lightweight - mounted it myself remote works great - the earbuds connected to the remote are a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: mmccready

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Roku TV! Easy setup, plenty of interesting apps (also international ones too) to download, good picture. It is a decent smart TV to have if you're on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Great color! Super easy set up when directions are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great color! Super easy set up when directions are followed. Good quality. Super thin. Overall very happy with this product. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fast ui, decent amount of apps a shame you can't play with the Google ecosystem, exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Dreadwing

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The remote had a bad back arrow key. It was replaced within a week. Sound quality OK but would greatly improve with a sound bar. Beautiful picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! The value of features to pricing is amazing and the Roku interface is such a refreshing experience vs the traditional proprietary garbage we see in TVs today. Highly recommend it to an existing Roku user.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jeske

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Great picture and the built in Roku is ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great picture and the built in Roku is easy to use and my new favorite thing. Highly recommend this TV.
customer_reviews.author: BigGreenFish

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is beautiful. The metal trim really elevates the look. The ROKU interface is super quick. The remote has a good weight to it, it doesn't feel like a piece of cheap plastic. I have it mounted on the wall, make sure you get help when doing that, the TV is so thin it flexes if you try to lift it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Farris

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: Solid TV for the price, picture quality isn’t the best but nothing to complain about. That’s the difference between edge lit and non edge lit TVs. Either way I’m a happy TCL-er
customer_reviews.author: Kapil Bhalla

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing TV. Two years in and absolutely no issues. Beautiful picture, great connectivity, easy navigation, and roku built in. What more could one want?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great thanks for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Lemme just say I liked it enough to buy a 55" as well for another room. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DrK

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!
customer_reviews.text: Remote is KLUNKY. But worst is ANTENNA connection. Broke off in ONE use. And this is a fairy common problem that they do NOT want to cover. Use EXTREME CARE if that's a connection you use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Berarducci

customer_reviews.title: Good picture
customer_reviews.text: Good colour and screen but the updates are a bit too much as it seems to update often.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... for about 2 months now and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tv for about 2 months now and I am very happy with it. It has the best quality picture of any tv ive ever owned. I was a little concerned cause I hadn't heard of tcl before but this is a great tv. It is very slim and looks great along with the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, and easy to get working right away!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got this TV! It is a beautiful TV, and it was easy to set up by myself! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Ida Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great TV love it
customer_reviews.text: Great Tv bought 50 in before this one and I just had to get a second one. You get a lot for the price of the TV and I love that you can plug in headphones to remote so you won’t bother your partner
customer_reviews.author: EDSTA85

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! My TV broke and we needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! My TV broke and we needed a new one. THis one was a great price. So far my family and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Great picture. You need download the manual if you want to have it. It only comes with the QuickStart pamphlet.
customer_reviews.author: Old Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Good HDR 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price range. Nice picture and built in roku is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Darkwolf

customer_reviews.title: but this is my new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this brand, always bought Samsung's, but this is my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, simple interface
customer_reviews.text: Loving this TV. I am usually an AV snob, but TCL delivers the goods. Great picture, simple interface, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marte

customer_reviews.title: TCL, made in the USA😎
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a nice 65 “ screen. And as far as I know it’s made in the USA and for me that’s important.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great tv. The only bad thing is no controls ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tv. The only bad thing is no controls on the tv. If you loose the remote you can only turn it on. You can't change channels or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: You probably don't want this TV.
customer_reviews.text: Was less than impressed overall. Clear, sharp images only occur during Dolby Vision content. Not unhappy with my purchase but definitely wouldn't recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: So far, very happy with this purchase. Picture quality is very good. Easy to install, setup and navigate.
customer_reviews.author: gnolen

customer_reviews.title: Biggest bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV set. Easy to follow instructions for fine tuning.
customer_reviews.author: truth hurts always

customer_reviews.title: Give it a chance
customer_reviews.text: This in my opinion is one great TV for the price easy to set up and use with out the heavy price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg

customer_reviews.title: ... couple months ago and find the TCL is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product a couple months ago and find the TCL is very easy to use. The picture is very nice but you will need a sound bar to bring out the volume for a decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd TCL Roku tv
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable tv. Beautiful picture and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hughes

product_meta.title: TCL 55C807 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku Smart LED TV (2017 Model)
product_meta.description: TCL, one of the world's largest TV manufacturers and America’s fastest growing TV brand, bring the latest in 4K technology and design. We've simplified the 4k Ultra HD TV so you can instantly enjoy endless entertainment. With Dolby Vision HDR, choose from more than 4,000 streaming channels that feature 450,000 movies and TV episodes plus live sports, news, music, kids and family, food, science and tech, fitness, foreign language and so much more. HDMI Ports: 3 HDMI 2.0 w/HDCP 2.2 (1 ARC); Resolution: 3840 x 2160; USB Ports: 1 USB 2.0
feature_bullets: Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 48.5" x 29.6" x 2.3", TV with stand: 48.5" x 31.2" x 9.6"
Roku TV smart functionality offers access to over 4,000 streaming channels featuring more than 450,000 movies and TV episodes
Pairs 4K Ultra HD picture clarity with the contrast, color, and detail of Dolby Vision HDR (High Dynamic Range) for the most lifelike picture
Edge LED backlighting with Dynamic Contrast produces deep blacks and excellent picture quality
120Hz refresh rate allows fast moving action scenes to be seen with virtually no motion blur
Inputs: 3 HDMI 2.0 with HDCP 2.2 (one with HDMI ARC), 1 USB (media player), RF, Composite, Headphone Jack, Optical Audio Out, Ethernet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars303 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
